group_1.textRight: Oh, you're up.
Who cares?@More importantly...
You're looking for something, right?
A place where your surroundings won't warp and@leave you floating in midair.
It's impossible.
It's impossible.@You're never gonna find it again.

group_1.textLeft: Why?@Why would you say something like that?

group_1.textRight: Ahaha!@You get what I'm trying to say, right?

group_1.textLeft: I became a Magical Girl to meet Mr. R
But as I met everyone, I still thought that I hadn't@only lost things.
That even if I lose people, or part ways with them,@it'll still lead to something new...
At least, that's what I thought...

group_1.textRight: But even if I make new connections, I'll just run away from them too.
I'm sure to abandon it of my own accord.

group_1.textLeft: Yes, that's right...@that's why I'll never find it again...

group_1.textRight: Mm...
Hozumi...!

group_1.textLeft: There's nothing you can do about it...

group_1.narration: Mitama just passed on a message from Kanagi;@she said she saw you in Daito.

She said it seemed like something was bothering you,@so I just got a little worried.@You can wait until you're done shopping or feeling more calm,@but I'd be happy if you could send me a quick message later.

group_1.textLeft: (...I knew she was worried about me.)

group_1.textRight: See, the thing about me is that I just can't stay in the same place
I'm just that kind of person.
If I try making a special place for myself,@I'll just feel miserable when I lose it.
So don't stop in one place!@Let's keep searching forever.
We can keep running like the wind,@pursuing our ideals for ever and ever.
It's not as bad as you'd think, y'know?@Traveling.
Right!
So we don't need to stay in this place anymore.
I mean, I'm just gonna throw it all away anyway.
So let's break everything, and venture out into the world.
Right!@I don't need any of this, right?
This isn't where I belong after all.
